Package cp213

Class SingleLink<T>

java.lang.Object
cp213.SingleLink<T>
Type Parameters:
T - data type for base data structure.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SingleList, SinglePriorityQueue, SingleQueue, SingleStack
public abstract class SingleLink<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<T>
The abstract base class for singly-linked data structures. Provides attributes and implementations for getLength, peek, isEmpty, toArray, and iterator methods. The head attribute is the first node in any singly-linked list.
Version:
2020-10-16
Author:
David Brown

    Returns the current number of elements in the linked structure.
    boolean isEmpty()
    Determines whether the linked data structure is empty or not.
    java.util.Iterator<T> iterator()  
    T peek()
    Returns a reference to the first data of the linked structure without removing that data from the structure.

    • peek

      public final T peek()
      Returns a reference to the first data of the linked structure without removing that data from the structure.
      Returns:
